title: Intro-tidy
section: Why should we care about the tidyverse?
text:
Why should we care about the tidyverse?

What’s the mean of mpg (miles per gallon) and the number of observations by cyl (cylinders) in the mtcars dataset?



tidyverse

mtcars %>%
  group_by(cyl) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(mpg), n = n())

# A tibble: 3 × 3
    cyl  mean     n
  <dbl> <dbl> <int>
1     4  26.7    11
2     6  19.7     7
3     8  15.1    14



base R

mtcars_by <- by(mtcars, mtcars$cyl, function(df) {
  with(df, data.frame(
    cyl = cyl[[1]],
    mean = mean(mpg),
    n = nrow(df)
  ))
})
do.call(rbind, mtcars_by)

  cyl     mean  n
4   4 26.66364 11
6   6 19.74286  7
8   8 15.10000 14
